content: **knitted reversible hipster hat in drops air sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-447 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m l xl fits head-size approx 54/56 56/58 58/60 cm height approx 23-24-25 cm with 10 cm fold-up **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150-150 g colour 41 sweet orchid **needles** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
